title: DevSecOps Developer
jobDescription:
1. The main responsibility will be to configure, re-configure, monitor and maintain DevSecOps Tools Container orchestration platform based on Bank s requirements, and performing managing backups and patching across the environments. Following are some of the key activities performed by the resource:
  2. Hardware Inventory Management, Troubleshooting, Call logging and Follow up with OEMs for the supplied systems.
  3. Server Administration, Health Monitoring of Servers Maintenance of daily checklist in the format provided by the bank.
  4. Apply patches, new releases, upgrades and fixes for the Hardware Infrastructure, Platform and tools supplied as part of this tender. These activities are to be carried out during non-business hours after obtaining prior approval from the bank.
  5. Application Management, Troubleshooting of Systems and Applications, Patching, Firmware and version up-gradation.
  6. Deploy, Administer, maintain, manage, troubleshoot and monitor Kubernetes workloads on the Container Platform.
  7. Install, configure and maintain all tools of DevSecOps Tools in Physical or Virtual environment, as decided by the Bank.
  8. FMS Team shall follow up and coordinate with OEM/ other support vendors for patch deployment.
  9. Root Cause Analysis (RCA) of the incidents and reporting of Security incidents.
  10. Prepare and maintain Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) documents pertaining to the services/Operations and should be updated whenever there is any change or addition is made.
  11. The FMS team shall optimize existing processes and recommend changes for optimal functioning of Solution, in-tune with best practices and audit compliance.
  12. Quality service delivery to match the uptime / SLA.
  13. Facility management is required for 24*7 on site.
  14. SLA Maintenance / Management, monthly Uptime reports, utilization reports interface utilization / reporting of all the devices.
  15. Provide support on various issues like performance bottlenecks, health check- up, resolution of any complex operational or performance or security issue, migration from an existing Closed Source / Commercial/ Proprietary/ other OSS Technology or software to the DevSecOps tools.
  16. Administration, management and monitoring of Integrated Centralized DevSecOps Tools.
  17. Coordinate with all the teams for follow-up for open tickets activities.
  18. Resolving technical issues lodge tickets with OEM and follow-up for pending calls.
  19. Identify and implement best practices / configurations on solutions under their purview.
  20. Responsible for resolving security concerns, OSS vulnerabilities, VAPT, maintenance of security policy in systems (SCD configuration), OSS hardening from time to time, as decided by the Bank.
  21. Perform periodic preventive health check / version upgrades for solutions under their purview.
  22. Identify and implement best practices / configurations on servers, databases, and other components under their purview.
  23. Providing service metrics to help assess how effective Bank s operations are running.
  24. Provide support to older versions of the OSS in case the Bank chooses not to upgrade to the latest version.
  25. Support and coordinate with the respective teams to onboard, legacy as well as new-age applications or services onto the Container Platform and DevSecOps Tools.
  26. Assist the Application teams to deploy their application related infrastructure configuration to Development, SIT, UAT, Staging, pre-Production Production environments, as applicable.
  27. Assist in requests from projects for troubleshooting of DevSecOps tools.
  28. Performing DC and DR Drill on periodic basis for the supplied solution ie Hardware Infrastructure, Container Platform, Enterprise OS DevSecOps Tools as per Banks requirement.
  29. Inventory details to be maintained by FMS Team having the support and configuration details of the Hardware Software as per format provided by the bank and should be provided to bank on requirement.
  30. Compliance to internal and external Audit observations statutory guidelines.

title: UI / UX Developer
jobDescription:

  • A strong working knowledge of Adobe CS and fully competent in Adobe Illustrator, HTML, CSS and Photoshop is essential. Knowledge of Adobe Pro is advantageous.
  • UI UX experience.
  • Team player as well as ability to take up independent task and mentor the team
  • Flexible
  • Strong knowledge of OOJS, common web design patterns.
  • Knowledge of MVC modelling in JS.
  • Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process.
  • Proficiency in Photoshop, Illustrator.
  • Expertise in HTML, HTML5, CSS and CSS3, JavaScript , JqueryUI, Bootstrap and other UI Technologies.
  • Extensive experience with JavaScript frameworks like JQuery, Angular JS, KnockoutJS
  • Experience designing and developing responsive, cross-browser solutions.

Roles Responsibilities:

  • Artwork creation: brochures, adverts, flyers, business cards and other marketing collateral and preparing artwork for print where necessary.
  • Designing and producing highly creative and impactful presentations.
  • Create e-marketing campaigns.
  • Creation of newsletter.
  • Design or adjust artwork and sales documents in line with brand guidelines.
  • Effectively manage multiple briefs at a time, prioritizing where necessary and providing updates where relevant.
  • Think creatively, generate new ideas, designs and concepts

title: Lead Shopify Developer
jobDescription:
1. Expert-level knowledge of Shopify Liquid templating language to edit the website
2. Design, develop, and maintain Shopify websites, ensuring functionality, user experience, and aesthetic appeal.
3. Offer technical support and mentorship to fellow team members as required.
4. Make bespoke themes and change all the pre-existing templates according to the predefined company guidelines. Should be a professional in all areas of the E-commerce platform.
5. He/She should be able to Increase the conversion rates by optimizing websites.
6. Work with the UI and UX design teams to make an inventive, strong, and unique user experience.
7. Must debug and test out the websites regularly to enhance their performance.
8. Should be able to analyze data from GA, and Shopify analytics and accordingly guide team on new activities.
9. Optimize website performance, including page speed, mobile responsiveness, and SEO.
10. Stay updated on Shopify platform updates, best practices, and industry trends.

Shopify Developer Requirements:
 
1. Proficiency in Shopify development, including Liquid templating language, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
2. A minimum of 2 years of experience in Shopify Websites Development.
3. A Bachelors degree in Computer Science or equivalent
4. Expert in JavaScript, DOM, CSS3 and HTML5.
5. Has previous experience in Storefront API and working with custom themes.
6. Previous experience in debugging or implementing 3rd-party Shopify applications and making unique solutions when it s required.
7. Must carry working knowledge of Shopify properties or objects, Meta fields, and AJAX API.
